img_above_text:
![Wukong Brook 2.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ee/Wukong_Brook_2.jpg)
Taking the path by the Shrine, you'll head down the slope and take a right to find the start of the river, which has a green Wisp to absorb and plants to harvest. Leave the other side of the ravine for the moment, and take the closer path on the side of a ravine nearest to where you came down.
img_below_text:
On this side, you'll find a few fallen trees creating makeshift bridges above the brook below, and one of them has another green Wisp to absorb along the tree, while the other has a green Wisp on top of a giant rock.
![Wukong Brook 4.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/65/Wukong_Brook_4.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 43 from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Brook 2.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ee/Wukong_Brook_2.jpg)
Taking the path by the Shrine, you'll head down the slope and take a right to find the start of the river, which has a green Wisp to absorb and plants to harvest. Leave the other side of the ravine for the moment, and take the closer path on the side of a ravine nearest to where you came down."
            - Following Text: "On this side, you'll find a few fallen trees creating makeshift bridges above the brook below, and one of them has another green Wisp to absorb along the tree, while the other has a green Wisp on top of a giant rock.
![Wukong Brook 4.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/65/Wukong_Brook_4.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary:
1. **Summary**: The image depicts the player character in *Black Myth: Wukong* navigating a snowy ravine. The character is mid-jump, wielding a glowing staff, heading toward a fallen tree bridge. A green Wisp, marked with a red circle, is visible in the distance atop a rock, indicating an interactable or collectible item.

2. **Narrative Role**: The image illustrates a key moment in the walkthrough where the player progresses through the ravine, utilizing fallen trees as makeshift bridges to reach collectible green Wisps. This scene emphasizes exploration and resource gathering in the game's environment.
